00084 enum ParameterContext {
00085     // none; no context necessary
00086     pContextNameNone = 0,  // hz
00087     // values specify hertz frequency
00088     pContextNameFrequency = 1,  // hz
00089     // values specify period in seconds
00090     pContextNamePeriodSeconds = 2, // seconds
00091     // values specify period in seconds
00092     pContextNamePeriodSamples = 3, // seconds
00093     // values specify a trigger, where non-zero is a trigger
00094     pContextNameTrigger = 4, // trigger
00095     // alternate pitch representation: midi pitch values
00096     pContextNamePitch = 5, 
00097     // beats per minute
00098     pContextNameBeatsPerMinute = 6, 
00099 
00100 };

00110 // names here should reflect there use in a generator or a family of generators
00111 // and not be general to any context
00112 enum ParameterName {
00113     pNameMinimum = 0,
00114     pNameMaximum = 1,
00115     pNameRefresh = 2,
00116     pNameRate = 3, // frequency in hertz, or period in sec
00117     pNameValue = 4, // a constant value, used for PolyConstant and Constant
00118 
00119     // this parameter name may be redundant with unit interval?
00120     pNameDutyCycle = 5,
00121 
00122     // operands can be signals or other general data sources
00123     // possible change to Control, Signal?
00124     pNameOperand1 = 6,
00125     pNameOperand2 = 7,
00126     pNameOperand3 = 8,
00127     pNameOperand4 = 9,
00128 
00129     pNameAmplitude = 10,
00130     pNameValueList = 11,
00131     pNameSelectionMethod = 12,
00132 
00133     // a unit interval control; possible rename position
00134     pNamePanLeftRight = 13,
00135 
00136     };
